page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart render data object
page.description: The data for the currently rendering context.

property.name: plot
property.description: The plot information.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of chart being plotted ("rect", "linear", "polar" or "radial").

property.name: dimensions
property.description: The parameters of the dimensions being plotted. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Object - Dimension Object]*.

property.name: axis
property.description: The axes being plotted. Property names will be "x" and "y" for "rect" charts, "angle" and "distance" for "polar" charts, and "value" for "linear" and "radial" charts. See *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object - Axis Object]*.

property.name: area
property.description: Information about plot area.

property.name: svg
property.description: The SVG drawn so far.

property.name: back
property.description: The background SVG.

property.name: fore
property.description: The foreground SVG.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML drawn so far.

property.name: back
property.description: The background HTML.

property.name: fore
property.description: The foreground HTML.

property.name: top
property.description: The top of the plot area.

property.name: bottom
property.description: The bottom of the plot area.

property.name: left
property.description: The left of the plot area.

property.name: right
property.description: The right of the plot area.

property.name: width
property.description: The width of the plot area.

property.name: height
property.description: The width of the plot area.

property.name: center
property.description: The center of the plot area.

property.name: x
property.description: The center "x" location.

property.name: y
property.description: The center "y" location.

property.name: arc
property.description: For "polar" and "radial" charts, the definition of the arc being drawn.

property.name: start
property.description: The start angle of the arc in degrees with "0" being up.

property.name: end
property.description: The end angle of the arc in degrees with "0" being up.

property.name: length
property.description: The length of the arc in degrees from start to the end angle.

property.name: direction
property.description: The direction of the arc. A value of "1" being clockwise and "-1" being counterclockwise.

property.name: radius
property.description: The radius of the plotted arc.

property.name: stretch
property.description: Whether or not the plot area will be stretchable.

property.name: groups
property.description: The data groups being plotted. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Object - Group Object]*.

property.name: group
property.description: The data group being plotted. If no group is being plotted at the current scope, the value will be null. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Object - Group Object]*.

property.name: point
property.description: The data point being plotted. If no point is being plotted at the current scope, the value will be null. See *[link:A5.chart Mapped Data Object - Point Object]*.

property.name: path
property.description: The path to the data being plotted.

property.name: group
property.description: The index of the group being plotted. If no group is being plotted at the current scope, the value will be -1.

property.name: point
property.description: The index of the point being plotted. If no point is being plotted at the current scope, the value will be -1.

property.name: palette
property.description: The current palette in use. See *[link:A5.chart.palettes]*.
